scripts.clean-all: for p in core backend-utils client engine sdk; do yarn --cwd papiea-$p run clean || exit 1; done
scripts.patch-all: for p in core backend-utils client engine sdk; do yarn --cwd papiea-$p version --patch  --no-git-tag-version --no-commit-hooks || exit 1; done
scripts.build-all: for p in core backend-utils client engine sdk; do yarn --cwd papiea-$p install ; yarn --cwd papiea-$p run build || exit 1; done
scripts.build-all!: yarn run clean-all && yarn run build-all
